description:
Upgraded with a burly new clamp design, this bell will stay right where you want it. The latest versions of Timber’s awesome little bells can handle even the gnarliest of rock gardens, so go out and ride tech all day, your bell won’t budge. Let people know you’re inbound; this bell produces a friendly "coming-at-ya" sound.

  • Spring loaded piston switch lets you easily silence the bell
  • Modular design is repairable
  • Made of solid brass for a crisp, clean sound
  • 3 shims included to fit bar diameters 22.2, 31.8, and 35mm
  • Quick release mechanism makes for an easy installation and removal
name: Timber Mountain Bike Bell - Quick Release Model Yew!
